playn.core.gl

Interface GLBuffer.Short

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GLBuffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GL20Buffer.ShortImpl
    Enclosing interface:
    GLBuffer

    public static interface GLBuffer.Short
extends GLBuffer
    A buffer of 16-bit unsigned integers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface playn.core.gl.GLBuffer

        GLBuffer.Float, GLBuffer.Short

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GLBuffer.Short add(int value)
      Adds a single value to this buffer.
      GLBuffer.Short add(int x, int y)
      Adds the supplied pair of values to this buffer.
      GLBuffer.Short add(short[] data)
      Adds the supplied values to this buffer.
      GLBuffer.Short add(short[] data, int offset, int length)
      Adds the supplied values to this buffer.
      short[] array()
      Returns the array that underlies this buffer.
      void drawElements(int mode, int count)
      Issues a draw elements call using this buffer to define the elements.

      • Methods inherited from interface playn.core.gl.GLBuffer

        bind, byteSize, capacity, destroy, expand, flush, position, reset, send, skip

      • add

        GLBuffer.Short add(short[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int length)
        Adds the supplied values to this buffer.
        Parameters:
        data - the values to be added.
        offset - the offset into data at which to start adding.
        length - the number of values from data to add.
        Returns:
        this buffer for call chaining.
